mapper.select: select * from INSHSpecifydriverhis where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
delete from INSHSpecifydriverhis where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}

update INSHSpecifydriverhis set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},carinfoid = #{carinfoid},personid = #{personid},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},licenseDesc = #{licenseDesc},licenseState = #{licenseState},isPrimary = #{isPrimary},relation = #{relation},licenseType = #{licenseType},habits = #{habits},fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi},nodecode = #{nodecode} where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
